Task1.task_description: Create a comprehensive product display component with filtering, sorting, and responsive design
Task1.details:
Successfully implemented product display component with all required features:
- Product listing with responsive grid layout
- Product details view with proper loading states
- Filtering and sorting functionality
- Comprehensive test coverage
- Visually verified components with good design consistency

Minor improvements recommended:
- Implement skeleton loading for product cards
- Optimize product image gallery for mobile devices
- Add lazy loading for images

Task1SubTask1.description: Set up project structure and API integration
Task1SubTask1.details: Create base project structure with API service, context, and basic components

Task1SubTask2.details: Create reusable ProductCard component and implement ProductList with grid layout

Task1SubTask3.details: Create ProductDetails component with loading states and responsive design

Task1SubTask4.details: Create ProductFilter with sorting and filtering capabilities including price range, category, search, and sorting options

Task1SubTask5.details: Comprehensive test suite implemented for all components including ProductList, ProductCard, ProductDetails, and ProductFilter. Tests cover loading states, error handling, user interactions, and responsive design.

Task1SubTask6.details: Visual verification completed. Components demonstrate good design consistency and usability. Minor improvements needed for image loading states and mobile optimization.
